verses.verse: The book <S%G976><s%> of the generation <S%G1078><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Abraham <S%G11><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Isaac; <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren; <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Phares <S%G5329><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Zara <S%G2196><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Tamar; <S%G2283><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Phares <S%G5329><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Esrom; <S%G2074><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Esrom <S%G2074><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Aram; <S%G689><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Aram <S%G689><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Aminadab; <S%G284><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Aminadab <S%G284><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Naasson; <S%G3476><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Naasson <S%G3476><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Salmon; <S%G4533><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Salmon <S%G4533><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Boaz <S%G1003><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Rahab; <S%G4477><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Boaz <S%G1003><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Obed <S%G5601><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Ruth; <S%G4503><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Obed <S%G5601><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jesse; <S%G2421><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesse <S%G2421><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> king; <S%G935><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> king <S%G935><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G3588><s%> that had been the wife of Uriah; <S%G3774><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Roboam; <S%G4497><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Roboam <S%G4497><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Abia; <S%G7><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Abia <S%G7><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Asa; <S%G760><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Asa <S%G760><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jehoshaphat; <S%G2498><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%G2498><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joram; <S%G2496><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Joram <S%G2496><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Ozias; <S%G3604><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Ozias <S%G3604><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joatham; <S%G2488><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Joatham <S%G2488><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Achaz; <S%G881><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Achaz <S%G881><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Ezekias; <S%G1478><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Ezekias <S%G1478><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Manasses; <S%G3128><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Manasses <S%G3128><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Amon; <S%G300><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Amon <S%G300><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Josiah; <S%G2502><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Josiah <S%G2502><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jechoniah <S%G2423><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time they were carried away <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon: <S%G897><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> were brought <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon, <S%G897><s%> Jechoniah <S%G2423><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Shealtiel; <S%G4528><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Shealtiel <S%G4528><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Zorobabel; <S%G2216><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Zorobabel <S%G2216><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Abiud; <S%G10><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Abiud <S%G10><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eliakim; <S%G1662><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Eliakim <S%G1662><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Azor; <S%G107><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Azor <S%G107><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Sadoc; <S%G4524><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Sadoc <S%G4524><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Achim; <S%G885><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Achim <S%G885><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eliud; <S%G1664><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Eliud <S%G1664><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eleazar; <S%G1648><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Eleazar <S%G1648><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Matthan; <S%G3157><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Matthan <S%G3157><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> husband <S%G435><s%> of Mary, <S%G3137><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> carrying away <S%G3350><s%> into Babylon <S%G897><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> carrying away <S%G3350><s%> into Babylon <S%G897><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations. <S%G1074><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> birth <S%G1083><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> on this wise: <S%G3779><s%> When as <S%G1063><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> was espoused <S%G3423><s%> to Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> they <S%G846><s%> came together, <S%G4905><s%> she was found with child <S%G2147><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> her <S%G846><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a just <S%G1342><s%> man, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> willing <S%G2309><s%> to make her a public example, <S%G3856><s%> <S%G846><s%> was minded <S%G1014><s%> to put her away <S%G630><s%> <S%G846><s%> privily. <S%G2977><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> thought <S%G1760><s%> on these things, <S%G5023><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a dream, <S%G3677><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to take <S%G3880><s%> unto thee Mary <S%G3137><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> wife; <S%G1135><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> that which is conceived <S%G1080><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> she shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> JESUS: <S%G2424><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G848><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a virgin <S%G3933><s%> shall be with child, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they shall call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> Emmanuel, <S%G1694><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> being interpreted <S%G3177><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> being raised <S%G1326><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sleep <S%G5258><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had bidden <S%G4367><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> unto him his <S%G848><s%> wife: <S%G1135><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> her <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> she had brought forth <S%G5088><s%> her <S%G848><s%> firstborn <S%G4416><s%> son: <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> JESUS. <S%G2424><s%>
